item.title: Tabletop role-playing game
item.description: Curated resources Character management Pathbuilder – for Pathfinder 2e 5th Edition Spellbook – spell management for Dungeons & Dragons 5e Virtual TableTop Foundry VTT Maps, assets, tokens, audio DungeonDraft – map maker 2-minute Tabletop – maps, assets & tokens Tabletop audio – ambient sounds database Databases (rules, items, monsters, lore, …) pf2etools.com – for Pathfinder 2e Archives of Nethys – for Pathfinder 2e 5e.tools – for Dungeons & Dragons 5e pf2.

item.title: Uses
item.description: Hardware Gaming PC Motherboard: MSI MAG B550 Tomahawk ATX AM4 CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X CPU cooler: be quiet! Pure Rock 2 Video card: Sapphire NITRO+ Radeon RX 6600 XT Memory: Crucial Ballistix 16GB (2x8Go), DDR4-3600 CL16 Power supply: Corsair TX650M Case: Corsair 4000D Airflow Daily driver laptop: Tuxedo Aura 15 Gen 2 (15.6" FHD, AMD Ryzen 5 5500U, 16GB RAM) Monitor: AOC CQ27G2U (27", 1440p, 144Hz) Mouse: HyperX Pulsefire Haste Wireless Headset: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Phone: Xiaomi Pocophone F1, with Lineage OS Desk: Aum World Wave + Handy Office chair: Ikea Markus Software OS: NixOS Display server: sway Terminal: foot Text editor: neovim Browser: librewolf Music player: cmus Video player: mpv Backup: borg Paid services rsync.
